methods.constructor: param _periodType 3. period type of the SLA param _whitelistedContract 5. enables the white list feature param _slaID 6. identifies the SLA to uniquely to emit dTokens

getAllowedTokensLength().notice: dev use this function to evaluate the length of the allowed tokens length return allowedTokens.length

isAllowedToken(address).notice: dev checks in the allowedTokens array if there's a token with _tokenAddress value param _tokenAddress 1. token address to check exixtence return true if _tokenAddress exists in the allowedTokens array

isStaker(address).notice: dev returns true if the _staker address is registered as staker param _staker 1. staker address return true if address is staker
